message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'll take 60% since I'm starting the game.
I think a 55/45 split is fair, considering we both lose money with each passing round. Let's get this done.
Bob, my friend, we're both losing out here with time. I'll be generous and take 55% - that's the same split you offered, but in my favor. It's a deal you can't refuse!
